body_html:
You could try casting the quantities to float and see if that is supported? Otherwise, please provide the minimal and complete reproducible test case.. Here are some tests to try.

import tensorflow as tf.
a=tf.constant(3)
b=tf.constant(6)
sess=tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.truediv(a,b))
sess.run(tf.div(a,b))
sess.run(tf.truediv(af,bf))
sess.run(tf.div(af,bf))
body_text:
You could try casting the quantities to float and see if that is supported? Otherwise, please provide the minimal and complete reproducible test case.. Here are some tests to try.

sess.run(tf.div(af,bf))
body:
You could try casting the quantities to float and see if that is supported? Otherwise, please provide the minimal and complete reproducible test case.. Here are some tests to try.

``` python
import tensorflow as tf.
a=tf.constant(3)
b=tf.constant(6)
sess=tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.truediv(a,b))
sess.run(tf.div(a,b))
sess.run(tf.truediv(af,bf))
sess.run(tf.div(af,bf))
```
